long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Coffee Break Companion: Your Friendly Work-Rest Timer
Description
Stay productive and refreshed with Coffee Break Companion, your adorable work-rest timer that keeps you balanced throughout your day! Watch as a cute animated coffee mug fills and empties based on your activity, helping you maintain healthy work and rest cycles.
Key Features

Charming coffee mug animation that responds to your work patterns
Gentle reminders when it's time to take a break or return to work
Customizable work and rest intervals
Floating, movable timer that stays with you across tabs
Simple activity tracking through keyboard and mouse movement
Cozy, distraction-free design

Benefits
✨ Prevent burnout with balanced work sessions
✨ Build healthy productivity habits
✨ Stay mindful of your screen time
✨ Keep your workflow natural and uninterrupted
Keywords
productivity timer, work-rest balance, pomodoro alternative, break reminder, focus timer, wellness extension, productivity companion, work-life balance, screen time management, mindful working
